title: wRotatr v1.102[Satfoun] {AMRG}
description:
<a href="http://kickass.to/wrotatr-v1-102-satfoun-amrg-apk-t7848067.html" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">http://kickass.to/wrotatr-v1-102-satfoun-amrg-apk-t7848067.html</a>


Required Android O/S : 4.0.3+


What's in this version : (Updated : Sep 8, 2013)
*Wallpaper is set faster
*Better quality on wallpapers
*Less fail chance when setting wallpaper (returning to default one)
*wRotatr now shows on "Change wallpaper" window
*Online picasa album support via gallery

The premise of this application is to change your android device's wallpaper at a set interval, either sequentially or randomizing picture order without horribly consuming your battery life. Modeling Google's new Holo user interface, wRotatr is easy to navigate and fast for users to get around without becoming overwhelmed by the awesomeness.

But what makes wRotatr special?
Integration!, we allow you to use any application you like to load wallpapers: Gallery (with Picasa support), any file explorer, or even Google drive and Dropbox!

So, what are you waiting for?

Hope Ull enjoy this upload ^_^
